raspuns1: anyone who uses someone's work, but with permission
raspuns4: anyone who uses someone's work without permission
raspuns corect: anyone who uses someone's work without permission

intrebare?: The term of copyright for a work posted on a web site:
raspuns1: Is the same as the term would be if the work was originally Published in print or any other Medium.
raspuns2: Does not exist because the internet is part of the Public Domain so it is not protected by copyright.
raspuns3: Lasts for the life of the author plus 70 years.
raspuns4: Depends upon whether a Copyright Notice is included on the web page on which the work appears.
raspuns corect: Lasts for the life of the author plus 70 years.

intrebare?: The poet Edgar Alle n Poe write many well known pieces of literary works, and he died in 1849. You can find legal and free copies of his writing on the internet. What category below applies to this situation?
